name: Mastery Talisman: Seeing Through the Disguise
description: When you play a card whose name was not in the initial deck at the start of the match: Create 1 Omni Element.

descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you play a card whose name was not in the initial deck at the start of the match:</color> Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>.
